tokens: chapter 1
sent_text: Chapter 1 .

tokens: see-01 i picture magnificent book - name True Stories from Nature forest primeval once age-01 i temporal-quantity 6 year
sent_text: Once when I was six years old I saw a magnificent picture in a book , called True Stories from Nature , about the primeval forest .

tokens: picture it boa constrictor swallow-01 animal
sent_text: It was a picture of a boa constrictor in the act of swallowing an animal .

tokens: be-located-at-91 thing copy-01 picture draw-01 here
sent_text: Here is a copy of the drawing .

tokens: say-01 book swallow-01 boa constrictor prey whole boa chew-01 - boa prey
sent_text: In the book it said : " Boa constrictors swallow their prey whole , without chewing it .

tokens: and possible-01 - move-01 they after that sleep-01 they temporal-quantity 6 month need-01 they digest-01 they
sent_text: After that they are not able to move , and they sleep through the six months that they need for digestion . "

tokens: ponder-01 i adventure jungle deep-02 then
sent_text: I pondered deeply , then , over the adventures of the jungle .

tokens: and succeed-01 i make-01 i picture draw-01 i ordinal-entity 1 after work-01 i pencil color some
sent_text: And after some work with a colored pencil I succeeded in making my first drawing .

tokens: picture - name Drawing Number One i
sent_text: My Drawing Number One .

tokens: and look-02 it this show-01 i masterpiece i grown-up ask-01 i frighten-01 interrogative picture draw-01 grown-up grown-up
sent_text: It looked like this : I showed my masterpiece to the grown - ups , and asked them whether the drawing frightened them .

tokens: contrast-01 answer-01 they frighten-01 interrogative
sent_text: But they answered : " Frighten ?

tokens: frighten-01 hat one any cause-01 amr-unknown
sent_text: Why should any one be frightened by a hat ? "

tokens: picture-01 - picture draw-01 i hat
sent_text: My drawing was not a picture of a hat .

tokens: picture-01 it boa constrictor digest-01 elephant
sent_text: It was a picture of a boa constrictor digesting an elephant .

tokens: contrast-01 and draw-01 i picture another cause-01 possible-01 - understand-01 grown-up it draw-01 i inside boa constrictor possible-01 see-01 grown-up it clear-06
sent_text: But since the grown - ups were not able to understand it , I made another drawing : I drew the inside of the boa constrictor , so that the grown - ups could see it clearly .

tokens: need-01 they explain-01 always
sent_text: They always need to have things explained .

tokens: and look-02 picture - name Drawing Number Two i this respond-01 grown-up i advise-01 grown-up i and lay-01 i picture draw-01 i boa constrictor or inside outside aside devote-01 i i and geography history arithmetic grammar instead-of-91 draw-01 time this
sent_text: My Drawing Number Two looked like this : The grown - ups ' response , this time , was to advise me to lay aside my drawings of boa constrictors , whether from the inside or the outside , and devote myself instead to geography , history , arithmetic and grammar .

tokens: cause-01 that give-up-07 i career magnificent person paint-02 age-01 i temporal-quantity 6 year
sent_text: That is why , at the age of six , I gave up what might have been a magnificent career as a painter .

tokens: dishearten-01 fail-01 and picture - name Drawing Number One picture - name Drawing Number Two i i
sent_text: I had been disheartened by the failure of my Drawing Number One and my Drawing Number Two .

tokens: and understand-01 - grown-up anything ever by-oneself tiresome explain-01 child thing grown-up always forever
sent_text: Grown - ups never understand anything by themselves , and it is tiresome for children to be always and forever explaining things to them .

tokens: cause-01 and choose-01 i profession another learn-01 i pilot-01 i airplane
sent_text: So then I chose another profession , and learned to pilot airplanes .

tokens: and fly-01 i over part world useful-05 i geography very
sent_text: I have flown a little over all parts of the world ; and it is true that geography has been very useful to me .

tokens: possible-01 distinguish-01 i country China name China state Arizona name Arizona glance-01 i
sent_text: At a glance I can distinguish China from Arizona .

tokens: value-02 knowledge such get-03 one lost date-entity night
sent_text: If one gets lost in the night , such knowledge is valuable .

tokens: encounter-01 i person many great concern-01 matter consequence many great course life this
sent_text: In the course of this life I have had a great many encounters with a great many people who have been concerned with matters of consequence .

tokens: live-01 i deal great among grown-up
sent_text: I have lived a great deal among grown - ups .

tokens: see-01 i they close-10 at-hand intimate-02 i
sent_text: I have seen them intimately , close at hand .

tokens: and improve-01 - that thing opine-01 i they much
sent_text: And that has n't much improved my opinion of them .

tokens: try-01 i experiment-01 show-01 picture - name Drawing Number One p keep-01 i always meet-02 i person include-91 they see-01 clear-08 seem-01 i any
sent_text: Whenever I met one of them who seemed to me at all clear - sighted , I tried the experiment of showing him my Drawing Number One , which I have always kept .

tokens: try-01 i find-out-03 i understand-01 interrogative person this true-01
sent_text: I would try to find out , so , if this was a person of true understanding .

tokens: contrast-01 say-01 or he she hat that always
sent_text: But , whoever it was , he , or she , would always say : " That is a hat . "

tokens: talk-01 i or boa constrictor forest primeval star person that ever -
sent_text: Then I would never talk to that person about boa constrictors , or primeval forests , or stars .

tokens: bring-01 i i level he down
sent_text: I would bring myself down to his level .

tokens: talk-01 i and bridge golf politics necktie he
sent_text: I would talk to him about bridge , and golf , and politics , and neckties .

tokens: and please-01 meet-02 g man sense-02 such grown-up great
sent_text: And the grown - up would be greatly pleased to have met such a sensible man .

tokens: chapter 2
sent_text: Chapter 2 .

tokens: cause-01 live-01 i talk-01 - anyone real-04 life i alone until have-06 i accident plane desert Sahara name Desert of Sahara before now temporal-quantity 6 year
sent_text: So I lived my life alone , without anyone that I could really talk to , until I had an accident with my plane in the Desert of Sahara , six years ago .

tokens: break-01 something engine i
sent_text: Something was broken in my engine .

tokens: and cause-01 have-03 i or mechanic passenger i - attempt-01 i repair-01 difficult alone all
sent_text: And as I had with me neither a mechanic nor any passengers , I set myself to attempt the difficult repairs all alone .

tokens: question-01 i or live-01 die-01 cause-01 have-03 i water drink-01 i enough scarce last-03 temporal-quantity 1 week i
sent_text: It was a question of life or death for me : I had scarcely enough drinking water to last a week .

tokens: sleep-01 i sand date-entity night ordinal-entity 1 relative-position place inhabit-01 human any distance-quantity 1000 mile away
sent_text: The first night , then , I went to sleep on the sand , a thousand miles from any human habitation .

tokens: isolate-01 i more person sail-01 shipwreck-01 raft ocean middle
sent_text: I was more isolated than a shipwrecked sailor on a raft in the middle of the ocean .

tokens: cause-01 possible-01 imagine-01 you amaze-01 i sunrise wake-01 voice odd little i
sent_text: Thus you can imagine my amazement , at sunrise , when I was awakened by an odd little voice .

tokens: say-01 it draw-01 imperative + you sheep i
sent_text: It said : " If you please -- draw me a sheep ! "

tokens: string-entity what
sent_text: " What ! "

tokens: draw-01 you sheep i imperative
sent_text: " Draw me a sheep ! "

tokens: jump-03 i thunderstruck complete-02 foot i
sent_text: I jumped to my feet , completely thunderstruck .

tokens: blink-01 i eye i hard-04
sent_text: I blinked my eyes hard .

tokens: look-01 i around i all careful
sent_text: I looked carefully all around me .

tokens: and see-01 i person small extraordinary most stand-01 there examine-01 i serious-01 great
sent_text: And I saw a most extraordinary small person , who stood there examining me with great seriousness .

tokens: possible-01 see-01 you portrait good-02 most make-01 i possible-01 late more he here
sent_text: Here you may see the best portrait that , later , I was able to make of him .

tokens: contrast-01 charm-01 picture draw-01 i less much very certain model picture
sent_text: But my drawing is certainly very much less charming than its model .

tokens: contrast-01 fault-01 i that -
sent_text: That , however , is not my fault .

tokens: discourage-01 grown-up i career person paint-02 i cause-01 learn-01 - i draw-01 i anything ever except-01 and boa from outside boa from inside age-01 i temporal-quantity 6 year
sent_text: The grown - ups discouraged me in my painter 's career when I was six years old , and I never learned to draw anything , except boas from the outside and boas from the inside .

tokens: stare-01 i thing appear-01 sudden this now start-03 eye i cause-01 astonish-01 i fair out-06 eye head i
sent_text: Now I stared at this sudden apparition with my eyes fairly starting out of my head in astonishment .

tokens: remember-01 you crash-01 i desert relative-position region inhabit-01 any distance-quantity mile 1000 away imperative
sent_text: Remember , I had crashed in the desert a thousand miles from any inhabited region .

tokens: contrast-01 seem-01 and stray-01 man little i among sand certain - - faint-01 man cause-01 or fatigue-01 hunger-01 thirst-01 fear-01 -
sent_text: And yet my little man seemed neither to be straying uncertainly among the sands , nor to be fainting from fatigue or hunger or thirst or fear .

tokens: suggest-01 nothing he child lose-02 desert middle relative-position thing inhabit-01 human any distance-quantity mile 1000 away
sent_text: Nothing about him gave any suggestion of a child lost in the middle of the desert , a thousand miles from any human habitation .

tokens: say-01 i contrast-01 be-located-at-91 interrogative you here cause-01 amr-unknown he possible-01 speak-01 i at-last
sent_text: When at last I was able to speak , I said to him : " But -- what are you doing here ? "

tokens: and repeat-01 he draw-01 imperative + you sheep i answer-01 he slow-05 very speak-01 he matter consequence great
sent_text: And in answer he repeated , very slowly , as if he were speaking of a matter of great consequence : " If you please -- draw me a sheep ... "

tokens: dare-01 one disobey-01 one - overpower-01 mystery too
sent_text: When a mystery is too overpowering , one dare not disobey .

tokens: take-01 i relative-position place any inhabit-01 human distance-quantity 1000 mile away endanger-01 die-01 i and paper sheet 1 pen fountain i pocket i possible-01 seem-01 absurd i
sent_text: Absurd as it might seem to me , a thousand miles from any human habitation and in danger of death , I took out of my pocket a sheet of paper and my fountain - pen .

tokens: contrast-01 and remember-01 i concentrate-01 and geography history arithmetic grammar study-01 i then tell-01 i know-03 - i draw-01 i chap little cross little also
sent_text: But then I remembered how my studies had been concentrated on geography , history , arithmetic , and grammar , and I told the little chap ( a little crossly , too ) that I did not know how to draw .

tokens: answer-01 he i matter-01 that -
sent_text: He answered me : " That does n't matter .

tokens: draw-01 you sheep i imperative
sent_text: Draw me a sheep ... "

tokens: contrast-01 draw-01 i sheep ever -
sent_text: But I had never drawn a sheep .

tokens: cause-01 draw-01 i picture 1 include-91 picture 2 draw-01 i often so he
sent_text: So I drew for him one of the two pictures I had drawn so often .

tokens: boa constrictor from outside
sent_text: It was that of the boa constrictor from the outside .

tokens: and astound-01 hear-01 i greet-01 f it and no no no fellow little i
sent_text: And I was astounded to hear the little fellow greet it with , " No , no , no !

tokens: want-01 i elephant inside boa constrictor -
sent_text: I do not want an elephant inside a boa constrictor .

tokens: and creature dangerous boa constrictor cumbersome very elephant
sent_text: A boa constrictor is a very dangerous creature , and an elephant is very cumbersome .

tokens: small very everything live-01 i
sent_text: Where I live , everything is very small .

tokens: need-01 i sheep
sent_text: What I need is a sheep .

tokens: draw-01 you sheep i imperative
sent_text: Draw me a sheep . "

tokens: cause-01 draw-01 i then
sent_text: So then I made a drawing .

tokens: and look-01 he it careful say-01 he no then
sent_text: He looked at it carefully , then he said : " No .

tokens: sick-05 sheep this very already
sent_text: This sheep is already very sickly .

tokens: make-01 you another i imperative
sent_text: Make me another . "

tokens: cause-01 make-01 i picture draw-01 i another
sent_text: So I made another drawing .

tokens: smile-01 person have-rel-role-91 i friend gentle indulgent
sent_text: My friend smiled gently and indulgently .

tokens: say-01 he see-01 you sheep this -
sent_text: " You see yourself , " he said , " that this is not a sheep .

tokens: ram this
sent_text: This is a ram .

tokens: have-03 it horn
sent_text: It has horns . "

tokens: cause-01 do-02 i picture draw-01 i over again 1 then
sent_text: So then I did my drawing over once more .

tokens: contrast-01 reject-01 it resemble-01 other too
sent_text: But it was rejected too , just like the others .

tokens: old too one this
sent_text: " This one is too old .

tokens: want-01 i sheep live-01 long-03
sent_text: I want a sheep that will live a long time . "

tokens: exhaust-01 patient-01 i cause-01 hurry-01 i start-01 i disassemble-01 i engine i by time this
sent_text: By this time my patience was exhausted , because I was in a hurry to start taking my engine apart .

tokens: cause-01 toss-out-02 i picture draw-01 i this off
sent_text: So I tossed off this drawing .

tokens: and explain-01 i it
sent_text: And I threw out an explanation with it .

tokens: box he this only
sent_text: " This is only his box .

tokens: be-located-at-91 sheep ask-01 you inside
sent_text: The sheep you asked for is inside . "

tokens: and surprise-01 see-01 i break-13 light over face person judge-01 i young i very say-01 way exact want-01 person it
sent_text: I was very surprised to see a light break over the face of my young judge : " That is exactly the way I wanted it !

tokens: think-01 you obligate-01 have-03 sheep this grass deal great interrogative
sent_text: Do you think that this sheep will have to have a great deal of grass ? "

tokens: cause-01 amr-unknown
sent_text: " Why ? "

tokens: cause-01 small very everything live-01 i
sent_text: " Because where I live everything is very small ... "

tokens: benefit-01 grass enough sure-02 he
sent_text: " There will surely be enough grass for him , "

tokens: say-01 i
sent_text: I said .

tokens: give-01 i sheep small very you
sent_text: " It is a very small sheep that I have given you . "

tokens: and bend-01 head over picture draw-01 h3 say-01 he look-01 imperative you small - so that
sent_text: He bent his head over the drawing : " Not so small that -- Look !

tokens: sleep-01 he
sent_text: He has gone to sleep ... "

tokens: and acquaint-01 i prince little that
sent_text: And that is how I made the acquaintance of the little prince .

tokens: chapter 3
sent_text: Chapter 3 .

tokens: take-10 temporal-quantity long-03 learn-01 i place come-01 he
sent_text: It took me a long time to learn where he came from .

tokens: seem-01 hear-01 - prince little question-01 i many so one ask-01 i prince ever
sent_text: The little prince , who asked me so many questions , never seemed to hear the ones I asked him .

tokens: reveal-01 word drop-06 chance-02 everything i little-by-little
sent_text: It was from words dropped by chance that , little by little , everything was revealed to me .

tokens: ask-01 he object that amr-unknown i see-01 he airplane i draw-01 - i cause-01 complicate-01 i too much ordinal-entity 1
sent_text: The first time he saw my airplane , for instance ( I shall not draw my airplane ; that would be much too complicated for me ) , he asked me : " What is that object ? "

tokens: object that -
sent_text: " That is not an object .

tokens: fly-01 it
sent_text: It flies .

tokens: airplane it
sent_text: It is an airplane .

tokens: airplane i it
sent_text: It is my airplane . "

tokens: and pride-01 i learn-01 he possible-01 fly-01 i
sent_text: And I was proud to have him learn that I could fly .

tokens: cry-out-03 he string-entity what then
sent_text: He cried out , then : " What !

tokens: drop-01 you sky down interrogative
sent_text: You dropped down from the sky ? "

tokens: yes
sent_text: " Yes , "

tokens: answer-01 i modest
sent_text: I answered , modestly .

tokens: oh expressive
sent_text: " Oh !

tokens: funny that
sent_text: That is funny ! "

tokens: and break-in-17 prince little laugh-01 peal lovely irritate-01 i much very
sent_text: And the little prince broke into a lovely peal of laughter , which irritated me very much .

tokens: like-02 i take-04 misfortune i serious-01
sent_text: I like my misfortunes to be taken seriously .

tokens: add-01 he cause-01 come-01 you sky too then
sent_text: Then he added : " So you , too , come from the sky !

tokens: planet you amr-unknown
sent_text: Which is your planet ? "

tokens: and catch-03 i gleam light mystery present-02 he penetrate-01 possible-01 - moment that demand-01 i come-01 interrogative you planet another abrupt
sent_text: At that moment I caught a gleam of light in the impenetrable mystery of his presence ; and I demanded , abruptly : " Do you come from another planet ? "

tokens: contrast-01 reply-01 he -
sent_text: But he did not reply .

tokens: and toss-01 he head he gentle take-away-05 - he eye he plane i say-01 he possible-01 - come-01 you away far very plane
sent_text: He tossed his head gently , without taking his eyes from my plane : " It is true that on that you can n't have come from very far away ... "

tokens: and sink-01 he reverie long-03
sent_text: And he sank into a reverie , which lasted a long time .

tokens: bury-01 he he contemplate-01 he treasure he take-out-11 he sheep pocket he i then
sent_text: Then , taking my sheep out of his pocket , he buried himself in the contemplation of his treasure .

tokens: possible-01 imagine-01 you arouse-01 confidence half planet other he curious-01 i
sent_text: You can imagine how my curiosity was aroused by this half - confidence about the " other planets . "

tokens: cause-01 effort-01 i find-out-03 i information more subject this great
sent_text: I made a great effort , therefore , to find out more on this subject .

tokens: say-01 come-01 you amr-unknown man little i
sent_text: " My little man , where do you come from ?

tokens: live-01 you place speak-01 you amr-unknown
sent_text: What is this ' where I live , ' of which you speak ?

tokens: want-01 you take-01 you sheep you amr-unknown
sent_text: Where do you want to take your sheep ? "

tokens: answer-01 he thing good-02 so box give-01 you he possible-01 use-01 he box house he date-entity night after silent reflect-02
sent_text: After a reflective silence he answered : " The thing that is so good about the box you have given me is that at night he can use it as his house . "

tokens: so that
sent_text: " That is so .

tokens: and give-01 i and string tie-01 y he date-entity day post tie-01 y he you good-02 y
sent_text: And if you are good I will give you a string , too , so that you can tie him during the day , and a post to tie him to . "

tokens: contrast-01 seem-01 shock-01 offer this prince little say-01 tie-01 imperative prince he
sent_text: But the little prince seemed shocked by this offer : " Tie him !

tokens: queer idea
sent_text: What a queer idea ! "

tokens: contrast-01 tie-01 - you he thing
sent_text: " But if you do n't tie him , "

tokens: say-01 i and wander-01 he somewhere get-03 he lost
sent_text: I said , " he will wander off somewhere , and get lost . "

tokens: break-in-17 person have-rel-role-91 i friend say-01 contrast-01 think-01 you go-02 he amr-unknown laugh-01 peal another
sent_text: My friend broke into another peal of laughter : " But where do you think he would go ? "

tokens: anywhere
sent_text: " Anywhere .

tokens: ahead straight-04 he
sent_text: Straight ahead of him . "

tokens: say-01 prince little matter-01 - that earnest-01 then
sent_text: Then the little prince said , earnestly : " That does n't matter .

tokens: small so everything live-01 i
sent_text: Where I live , everything is so small ! "

tokens: and add-01 he go-02 somebody - far very ahead straight-04 somebody sad-02 hint possible-01
sent_text: And , with perhaps a hint of sadness , he added : " Straight ahead of him , nobody can go very far ... "
